channel.title: Photography on Ryuichiro Suzuki
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on Ryuichiro Suzuki

item.title: First Time Developing Black and White Film
item.description: Film development in Japan is getting worse and more expensive I’ve been developing film with mostly Kitamura, one of the biggest photo printing chain in Japan. Many stores in Tokyo have in-store developer and scanner and they would develop, scan and give you a QR code from which you can download the results. I used to like the quality and how easy it is to use. However, I’ve noticed that recently, they increased the price for a higher quality scan, and they made the cheaper scanning option’s quality so low.
